Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Six-shooter \Six"-shoot`er\, n. A pistol or other firearm which can be fired six times without reloading especially, a six-chambered revolver. [Colloq. U.S.] [1913 Webster]
six-shooter n : a pistol with a revolving cylinder (usually having six chambers for bullets) [syn: {revolver}, {six-gun}]
